page.title: 11Industry contd.
page.content:
Two other employers in the town that are specialist in their own way are;High Heat Mouldings ( making injection moulded components for a variety of customers ) and Wood and Mott ( specialising in reproduction furniture of very high class, much of which is made to order for foreign buyers. )
As with most communities there are a number of small builder / decorators, electricians, motor vehicle repairers and other services the majority of whom do not employ more than three or four staff,usually they are of one man operation. Most of these enterprises are adjacent to the Waterfront or on an Industrial Estate located off Sampsons Road.
